name: Cannon Kid: The Kid With A Cannon
name_original: Cannon Kid: The Kid With A Cannon
description:
Cannon Kid!

Cannon Kid is here to save the world, and he has a cannon! Blast away at high speeds by shooting in this fast-paced platformer.

-Controls-

Move Left: A
Move Right: D
Aim: Mouse
Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Play fullscreen for the best experience!

(or in desktop :D )
